title: Lidar maker Ouster adds cameras with StereoLabs acquisition
description:
Ouster said the deal enables it to offer a unified sensing and perception platform that combines lidar, cameras, AI compute, sensor fusion and perception software.

The post Lidar maker Ouster adds cameras with StereoLabs acquisition appeared first on The Robot Report.
